name: ClearActorAnimations
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Clear any animations applied to an actor.

params_body.name: actorid
params_body.description: The ID of the actor (returned by CreateActor) to clear the animations for.

return_values: 0: The function failed to execute. The actor specified does not exist.
related_fn: ApplyActorAnimation: Apply an animation to an actor.
